attributes.action: abolish the tax free status of allowances and other benefits in kind received by members of parliament and, in some cases, by members of their extended family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs are employees of the people.  There is no other precedent nor justification for MPs and their families to receive allowances and benefits upon which they are not required to pay the rate of income tax relevant to their total income - which all other employees, who are not members of parliament, are required to do under the laws of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
